籤詩版本二:
Mentingji nwere obi ụtọ nke ukwuu, na ọnụ ụzọ ọrụ ọma na-aga nke ọma.
Ihe niile na-aga nke ọma n'ubi alụmdi na nwunye, ma mgbe ọrịa na-ezute ọgwụ magburu onwe ya, ị ga-adị mma
詩意:
Hexagram a na-anọchi anya nrọ mmiri nke nwere ọtụtụ narị ifuru.
Ihe niile dị mma mgbe ị zutere onye ama ama.

(hexagram a bụ ihe ịrịba ama nke ememe mara mma.
Ihe niile na-aga nke ọma.
)
解曰: Mmiri dị omimi ma anyanwụ na-ekpo ọkụ. Okooko osisi na-eto n'onwe ha. egbula oge. Na-apụta site na ndị mmadụ.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ubochi ọmụmụ Guo Fenyang
Guo Ziyi, onye isi izugbe nke Tang Dynasty na Eze Fenyang mere emume ncheta ọmụmụ. Ndị ikwu na ndị enyi bịara kelee ya, ọnọdụ ahụ jupụtara n’ọṅụ na ọṅụ.
聖意: Ezinụlọ na-aga nke ọma, mmadụ na-adịkwa mma, akụ na ụba na-aga nke ọma, azụmahịa na-aga nke ọma, alụmdi na nwunye na-aga nke ọma, Liujia na-egbochi ihe ịtụnanya, ndị ji ụkwụ aga ubi, silkworm na-eme nke ọma, anụ ụlọ na-eme nke ọma, a chọtara ndị mmadụ, a na-ekpe ikpe. merie, mbata na-aga nke ọma, ihe furu efu na-achọ ngwa ngwa, ọrịa bụ Anshan, ili dị mma,
第X籤: Iri isii na asatọ: Imeri lọtrị (Lottery)
